original_solution_mapping.L2: The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry 40 / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L3: So he will have been traveling for 40 + 20 = <<40+20=60>>60 minutes.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6021.
    Returns: the total number of minutes Harry will have spent traveling.
    """
    # L1
    initial_bus_time = 15 # already been sat on the bus for 15 minutes
    remaining_bus_time = 25 # rest of the journey will take another 25 minutes
    total_bus_journey_time = initial_bus_time + remaining_bus_time

    # L2
    walk_time_divisor = 2 # half the amount of time
    walk_time = total_bus_journey_time / walk_time_divisor

    # L3
    total_travel_time = total_bus_journey_time + walk_time

    # FA
    answer = total_travel_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry {total_bus_journey_time} / {walk_time_divisor} = <<{total_bus_journey_time}/{walk_time_divisor}={walk_time}>>{walk_time} minutes.
So he will have been traveling for {total_bus_journey_time} + {walk_time} = <<{total_bus_journey_time}+{walk_time}={total_travel_time}>>{total_travel_time} minutes.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry 40 / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 minutes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: So he will have been traveling for 40 + 20 = <<40+20=20>>20 minutes.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '+' but used '-' instead.
